description: A semiconductor manufacturing plant uses an AI agent to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The agent analyzes sensor data from various machines to identify patterns and predict potential issues before they lead to downtime.  The goal is to minimize production disruptions and maintenance costs.
initial_goal: Minimize production downtime and maintenance costs in the wafer fabrication facility by predicting and scheduling preventative maintenance on critical equipment (etchers, implanters, lithography tools).
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a wafer fabrication facility)
